DOC.brief_title: Retropubic Single Incision Minisling Versus Tension Free Vaginal Tape Management Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Patients urodynamic stress urinary incontinence , without pelvic organ prolapse Patients overactive bladder urodynamic study . Patients void dysfunction .
